mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_TITLE, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_CREATED_AT, PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION, PRODUCT_SIZE, PRODUCT_WARNING, CATEGORY_NO, PRODUCT_SALES, PRODUCT_HIT, PRODUCT_RATING , (SELECT SUM(OPTION_COUNT) FROM PRODUCT_OPTION_T OPT WHERE P.PRODUCT_NO = OPT.PRODUCT_NO) AS PRODUCT_COUNT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW_T R WHERE R.OPTION_NO IN (SELECT OPT.OPTION_NO FROM PRODUCT_OPTION_T OPT WHERE P.PRODUCT_NO = OPT.PRODUCT_NO)) AS REVIEW_COUNT FROM PRODUCT_T P WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW_T WHERE OPTION_NO IN (SELECT OPTION_NO FROM PRODUCT_OPTION_T WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo})
SELECT REVIEW_NO, USER_NO, OPTION_NO, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENTS, REVIEW_RATING FROM REVIEW_T WHERE OPTION_NO IN (SELECT OPTION_NO FROM PRODUCT_OPTION_T WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo})
